name: Caldwell - Long Live the King by AJ - Toro
brand: Caldwell, Long Live the King by AJ
additionalNotes: Caldwell Long Live the King by AJ Fernandez are a very popular line of premium cigars that is the result of a collaboration between Robert Caldwell and AJ Fernandez, two of the hottest cigarmakers on the planet. This line extension to Robert Caldwell’s Long Live the King cigars, swaps out the original Dominican wrapper, binder, and fillers, for AJ’s signature blend of estate grown Nicaraguan tobacco. These top-shelf Nicaraguan puros are covered by a stunning oily wrapper and reward the palate with rich full-bodied notes of earth, toast, anise, espresso, and black pepper.
